name: Soulless (AndrewLi) (AndrewLi)
description:
Soulless

Trapped in your house and in your mind, you have nothing but disappear. Fortunately, there is alcohol in the house to smooth the pain and provide solace, just don't tell mom about it. 

Play now online here: https://itch.io/embed-upload/2251772?color=fe5e5e

GitHub: https://github.com/Zeyu-Li/Quarantined_Game_Jam

Game Jam Submission: https://goldentoaste.itch.io/soulless
